service_info.description: Service for managing couriers equipment crit
service_info.name: eats-couriers-equipment-crit

create_data.description:
В этом тикете робот будет описывать прогресс создания нового сервиса.
Обычно все получается сделать за 1-2 часа.

Параметры сервиса:
Needs unstable: True
Needs balancers: True
Wiki link: https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/taxi/backend/architecture/eats-couriers-equipment/
Original ticket: 
Requester: @deoevgen
Design review ticket: https://st.yandex-team.ru/TAXIARCHREVIEW-265
<{Nanny params stable
cpu: 2000
datacenters_count: 2
datacenters_regions:  
vla
man
sas
instances: 1
persistent_volumes:  
    bandwidth_guarantee_mb_per_sec: 1
    bandwidth_limit_mb_per_sec: 2
    path: /cores
    size: 10240
    type: hdd
    bandwidth_guarantee_mb_per_sec: 1
    bandwidth_limit_mb_per_sec: 2
    path: /logs
    size: 50000
    type: hdd
    bandwidth_guarantee_mb_per_sec: 1
    bandwidth_limit_mb_per_sec: 2
    path: /var/cache/yandex
    size: 2048
    type: hdd
ram: 8192
root_bandwidth_guarantee_mb_per_sec: 1
root_bandwidth_limit_mb_per_sec: 2
root_size: 10240
root_storage_class: hdd
work_dir: 256
}>

<{Nanny params unstable
cpu: 500
datacenters_count: 1

vla
man
sas
instances: 1

    bandwidth_guarantee_mb_per_sec: 3
    bandwidth_limit_mb_per_sec: 3
    path: /cores
    size: 10240
    type: ssd
    bandwidth_guarantee_mb_per_sec: 6
    bandwidth_limit_mb_per_sec: 6
    path: /logs
    size: 50000
    type: ssd
    bandwidth_guarantee_mb_per_sec: 3
    bandwidth_limit_mb_per_sec: 3
    path: /var/cache/yandex
    size: 2048
    type: ssd
ram: 2560

root_bandwidth_limit_mb_per_sec: 3
